header.title: Software Engineer Intern | MS CS @ Northeastern | Kubernetes | Go | Python | Distributed Systems | AI/ML Infrastructure

resume.summary: Highly motivated MS CS student at Northeastern University with **2+ years of full-time experience** in building scalable, secure distributed systems. Eager to apply strong proficiency in **Kubernetes, Go, and Python** to support Gruve's Inferencing & Infrastructure team. Seeking a **Spring/Summer 2026 co-op** to gain hands-on experience in container orchestration, multi-tenancy, and AI workload optimization, leveraging academic projects like a **Go-based Kubernetes Operator** and **Deep Reinforcement Learning agent**.

skills.items: Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, AWS (Lambda, SQS, EC2), CI/CD, Infrastructure-as-Code
Python, Go, Java, C++, JavaScript, TypeScript, SQL, C#
Microservices, REST APIs, Distributed Systems, Event-Driven Architecture, Asynchronous Processing
PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras, Deep Learning, Neural Networks, GPU Training, ML Inference
MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, DynamoDB, SQL Optimization, ETL Pipelines, Database Design
AWS (WAF, IAM, CloudWatch), Security Best Practices, TLS, Access Control
Git, Agile, TDD, Design Patterns, SOLID Principles, Code Review, CI/CD

bullets: Engineered **event-driven microservices** on AWS Lambda, processing **7.5M+ XML compliance records** for 180+ countries at **40 records/second**.
Architected **multi-queue priority routing** framework, improving **high-priority KYC/AML screening turnaround by 35%** and reducing latency by 40%.
Developed scalable Python/Java services, ensuring **99.9% data integrity** and **zero-downtime migrations** for critical financial data platforms.
Implemented robust **security hardening** (AWS WAF, IAM, TLS) across services, reducing potential security incidents by **50%** for sensitive data.
Optimized **Lambda-based API performance** and compute utilization, contributing to efficient, cost-effective cloud infrastructure.
Developed **high-throughput Python data processing pipelines**, achieving **3x throughput improvement** through concurrent execution.
Designed and integrated **microservices with API orchestration**, reducing manual interventions by **50%** through automation.
Optimized database query performance and ETL pipeline efficiency, **reducing data processing latency by 35%** and enhancing system responsiveness.
Implemented comprehensive monitoring, scheduling, and **error-handling frameworks**, improving data extraction accuracy by **20%**.

projects.title: Orion Platform
projects.tech: Go, Kubernetes, Operator SDK, Docker, CRDs
projects.bullet1: Engineered a **Go-based Kubernetes Operator** for a cloud-native PaaS, enabling **single-command application deployment** with custom CRDs.
projects.bullet2: Designed for **environment-aware provisioning** and automated resource setup (PostgreSQL, Redis), demonstrating **robust infrastructure automation**.

projects.title: Dino Game Deep RL Agent
projects.tech: Python, PyTorch, Deep Reinforcement Learning, ResNet, OpenCV
projects.bullet1: Developed an **autonomous AI agent** using **Double DQN with ResNet** in PyTorch, learning to play Chrome's Dino game.
projects.bullet2: Implemented **GPU-accelerated training** and real-time screen capture, demonstrating skills in **AI workload development and optimization**.

projects.title: Port Management System
projects.tech: Django, MySQL, Python, Advanced SQL, Stored Procedures
projects.bullet1: Built a **database-driven maritime logistics platform** with **50+ stored procedures** and **Dijkstra's pathfinding algorithm** in SQL.
projects.bullet2: Implemented **multi-role authentication** and complex business logic, showcasing **system design for isolation, security, and performance optimization**.
